item.title: Lenovo TrackPad & TrackPoint Fix
item.description: Lenovo Arch TrackPoint & TrackPad Sensitivity Fix For those not following me on Instagram or Twitter I’ve recently made the switch to EndeavourOS (a flavour of Arch Linux) and have been using it as my daily driver.
